input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to work at sea world?
input_text.Response A: To work at SeaWorld, you can go to the SeaWorld Careers website and search for job opportunities. You can also check with local employment agencies or attend job fairs. Once you find a position you are interested in, you will need to apply and go through the hiring process.
input_text.Response B: Sure! To work at Sea World, you need to be 18 years or older. You can apply online or in person. If you are hired, you will need to pass a drug test and a background check. You will also need to be able to work long hours and be able to handle stress.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.

label_annotations.feedback: B is better as it is more friendly and has some actual job reqirements, A states the obvious
